changeSet.comment: Migrating already imported form names and descriptions
changeSet.sql: UPDATE muzimaforms_form mform JOIN form form ON mform.form_id = form.form_id SET mform.name = form.name, mform.description = form.description

changeSet.author: pwangoo
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE muzima_setting CONVERT TO CHARACTER SET utf8

column.name: name
column.value: Patient Identifier auto-generation

column.name: description
column.value: Defines whether or not patient patient identifier should be autogenerated during processing mUzima registration data. This should be set to 'true' if autogeneration is needed

column.name: name
column.value: Patient Identifier auto-generation Source name

column.name: description
column.value: Specifies name of auto-generation source defined in ID-GEN module

changeSet.author: pwangoo
changeSet.comment: Creating a default mUzima data source with the name Mobile Devices

column.name: name
column.value: Mobile Devices

column.name: description
column.value: Default data source
